attributes.action: Introduce an energy price cap for small business.
attributes.additional_details: We want the government to introduce an energy price cap immediately for small businesses similar to those of domestic bills to prevent business closures and unfair price increases.
attributes.background: Businesses are facing a catastrophic Winter reporting 400-500% increases in energy bills. This is making many normally profitable  businesses unviable and will lead to closures and job losses over the coming months, particularly in hospitality and retail.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619529
